simplenlg.lexicon.lexicalitems
Enum Pronoun

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Pronoun>
      simplenlg.lexicon.lexicalitems.Pronoun
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Pronoun>, LexicalItem
public enum Pronoun
extends Enum<Pronoun>
implements LexicalItem

This enum extends the ContentWord abstract class for the personal pronouns.

Author:
agatt

getPerson

public Person getPerson()
Get the Person feature of this Pronoun. E.g. If the Pronoun is Pronoun.PRO_1SG, this returns Person.FIRST.

Returns:
The Person constant appropriate for this pronoun.

getNumber

public Number getNumber()
Get the Number feature of this Pronoun. E.g. If the Pronoun is Pronoun.PRO_1SG, this returns Number.SINGULAR.

Returns:
The Number constant appropriate for this pronoun.

getPronoun

public static Pronoun getPronoun(String word)
Utility method, which returns the constant defined in this enum corresponding to a particular word. For example, this returns PRO_2SG if passed the argument "you".

Parameters:
word - The string corresponding to the pronoun. Essentially, any of "I", "you", "they", "he", "she", "we". Note that the method is NOT case-sensitive.
Returns:
The corresponding Pronoun in this enum
